sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import RTCMultiConnection from 'rtcmulticonnection' import { useRouteMatch } from 'react-router' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import Toast from '../utils/notifications' function StudentPage() { const connection = new RTCMultiConnection() const match = useRouteMatch() let roomId = match?.params?.uuid || 1 const [show, setShow] = useState(true) const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', camera: true, micro: false, role: 'host' }) const handleChangeUser = (name, value) => { setUser(prevTags => { return { ...prevTags, [name]: value } }) } const handleChangeSwitch = (name) => { setUser(prevTags => { return { ...prevTags, [name]: !prevTags[name] } }) } const handleClose = () => setShow(false) // const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log('connection', connection) connection.socketURL = 'https://rtcmulticonnection.herokuapp.com:443/' connection.session = { audio: user.micro, video: user.camera } connection.sdpConstraints.mandatory = { OfferToReceiveAudio: true, OfferToReceiveVideo: true, } connection.user = user // roomId = connection.token() connection.openOrJoin(roomId) Toast.success('You are joining the class!!!', '') handleClose() return false } return (
JOIN CLASS ROOM
handleSubmit(event)}> Name handleChangeUser('name', event.target.value)} /> Camera handleChangeSwitch('camera')} /> micro handleChangeSwitch('micro')} />

Teacher: {user.name}
) } export default StudentPage
